Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights bb package break position sightseeing 100 metres hyde park 5 mins walk queensway underground stations reception efficient hotel refurbished itour refurbished clean ok bar hotel restaurant que breakfast continental meatcheese etci believe cooked breakfast available price wasnt adequate short sightseeing trip bed night

Reviews.Title: “Look elsewhere”
Reviews.Author: terdec
Reviews.Content: reservation dont hold booked 3 twins 3 doubles fight changed fire alarm random times 4 6 days elevators day person elevator 5 days 6 serving 5 floors peeling wallpaper etc location okay breakfast otherwise beware

Reviews.Title: “basic but value 4 money”
Reviews.Author: michelle1812
Reviews.Content: husband booked trip 4 xmas bargain price 6999 4 2 nights bed breakfast looked reviews mortified worry amount bs stayed blackpool rest hotel bit grotty paint wise staff friendly clean fresh bathroom clean powerful breakfast toast cereal stay base 4 excellant location 4 underground

Reviews.Title: “Lot better than the reviews we had read before we went”
Reviews.Author: WestMidlandsCybil
Reviews.Content: seeing reviews dreading hotelafter train euston jumpin tube queensway 2 minute walk hotelwe arrived able leave eatthe ready 200 acrossthe satisfactory cleanthe bed comfortable shower goodwe wait 2 minutes seated breakfast seated plenty food realise 5 star hotel pay pay hotel couldnt expect vacate 1200 able 2 leave brought look ed taxi station helpful called uswould definetley stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “BASIC BUT CLEAN”
Reviews.Author: goldfish53
Reviews.Content: read reviews friend somewhat apprehensive hotel fears groundless yes photos look clean basic using sleeping didnt matter bedding clean fresh surprise cleaned 2 nights bother noise residents maybe lucky lifts managed luckily neither overweight lol hotel situated 30 minute walk oxford st bad concierge robert helpful friendly day cheap basic hotel pay

Reviews.Title: “No thrills budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: indie1982
Reviews.Content: booked hotel package london read reviews prior werent looking forward wed day wed literally using hotel sleep clean thats looking checkin swift preauthorisation credit card â£20 cash left deposit opted cash option reception staff spoke english knowledge mentioned 2 lifts hotel 2 people luggage third floor 308 thankfully ones recently refurbished slightly bigger double bed wardrobe desk ensuite bathroom bathroom modern tiled clean shower cubicle basin toilet cramped little dry taking shower theres ac window wide theres radiator control hot quickly budget hotel didnt expect ac bed comfy little bit creaky flat screen tv mounted wall terrestrial channels 15 available thats fire alarm constantly night theyre rehearsed diving reception stop alarm soon presumably smoking sets stayed 3 nights alarm 4 times hotel noisy gap bottom door noise people walking corridor doors slamming hotel located 2 underground stations streets kensington park road honest fire alarm didnt guaranteed refurbished pay bad youre day

Reviews.Title: “To call it a dump would be an insult to that word.”
Reviews.Author: tonyuk36
Reviews.Content: tiny lift peeling paint wallpaper tiny tiny bathroom tiny mouse run floor 5 stains sheets stains carpet radiator climb wife move walked hotel 1 hour checking dump
